title: Ticket #2990: Cgroups code doesn't cleanly handle nodes with swap accounting disable
description:
When we added cgroup support, we read out of the statistics for the max memory + swap used by the job.

In some cases (RHEL6 with a special boot parameter, F16 by default), swap accounting is disabled. The statistic we use is unavailable and the procd sends out an angry message to the log.

The attached patch just looks at max memory in case if memory + swap is unavailable.
